title: Full Stack Development
description: Building responsive, high-performance web applications using modern frameworks for scalable and interactive user experiences.

title: Frontend Development
description: Creating dynamic, user-centric interfaces with React.js, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, focused on performance and accessibility.

title: Backend Development
description: Developing secure, scalable server-side applications with Node.js and Express.js, including RESTful APIs and JWT authentication.

title: Database Management
description: Proficient in managing and designing databases with MongoDB, Postgress and SQL, optimizing data storage and retrieval for high-performance apps.

title: C++ Programming
description: Skilled in C++ with expertise in Data Structures Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming (OOPS). Proficient in STL for high-performance applications.

title: JavaScript
description: Crafting dynamic and interactive web applications using modern JavaScript (ES6+) fundamentals and advanced features.

title: Python Programming
description: Solid understanding of Python basics, including libraries and frameworks, to build efficient solutions for a variety of tasks.

title: .NET Core Development
description: Building robust, scalable, and secure server-side web applications using .NET Core, C#, and related technologies.

title: Node.js
description: Leveraging the power of Node.js to build fast, scalable, and efficient backend services with an event-driven, non-blocking architecture.
